description:
Setsu Suzaki and his classmates are suddenly summoned to a foreign world, and arrives at a kingdom that is just about to plunge itself into war. Most of the children are confused, except for Setsu, because this isn`t his first time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je me fais isekai pour la deuxième fois… Ça commence à faire beaucoup
Summoned to Another World for a Second Time
異世界召喚は二度目です
